summary: Adds 70 new conjuration spells to the game, as well as a new Perk. Updated regularly.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 70 Conjuration summoning spells, sold by various merchants, and a NEW CONJURATION PERK:

=={NOTE ON THE PERK AND THE \"SUMMON UNDEAD ARMY\" SPELL}==

This mod adds a new perk to the conjuration perk tree, called \"Conjuration Madness\". Currently, this perk adds 20 to the number of creatures you can have summoned at a time. The perk requires 100 in conjuration, to maintain balance. The perk is intended for use with the some of the new spells that summon multiple creatures, and to generally improve your conjuration experience. The perk is balanced because summoning 20 individual powerful creatures would take A) way too much magicka and B) way too much time (they last 60s each). Therefore, it can\'t be abused to give yourself, say, 20 greybeards (you\'d never have enough magicka to summon them in that short a time). You can, however, utilize that super awesome lv. 70-80 character\'s vast magicka reserves to have some incredible fights (imagine a greybeard, dragon priest, and a dragon versus a camp of bandits). 
[][][][][][][]YOU NEED THE PERK TO USE SPELLS THAT SUMMON MULTIPLE CREATURES![][][][][][][]
Otherwise, you\'ll only spawn 1 or 2 creatures (depending on whether or not you have the \"Twin Souls\" perk).

The following merchants sell 1 random novice and apprentice spell tome:

-Wylandriah (Riften)

-Falion (Morthal)

Additionally, Sybille Stentor (Solitude) and Wuunferth the Unliving (Windhelm) sell 1 random novice, apprentice, and adept spell tome, while the Riverwood Trader (Riverwood) sells 1 random novice tome. 

However, the only place you\'ll find expert or master spell tomes is Urag gro Shug at the College of Winterhold (arcanaeum), who sells 1 of every tome in the mod.
